item.title: Kaffestrig Weekly -#2
item.description: Though I only managed to accomplish very little this week, I still made progress!

item.title: Kaffestrig Weekly -#1
item.description: First weekly update on all things Kaffestrig!

item.title: Kaffestrig
item.description: A local-coop adventure and management game created in the Godot Engine.

item.title: Hello world!
item.description: My first post on this blog, and the start of an exciting new adventure! I’ve always wanted to start writing, and after keeping up with daily notes consistently in my [[Obsidian]] vault, I decided it was about time to start my dream blog.
